Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-56433 affecting package shadow-utils for versions less than shadow-utils_4.18.0
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-56433 affecting package shadow-utils for versions less than shadow-utils_4.18.0. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package shadow-utils is earlier than shadow-utils_4.18.0, affected by CVE-2024-56433
